EmailTemplate.subject: Here's the download you requested.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Hello, {{Lead.First Name}},
Your use case “Security cloud for large enterprises” is ready to download.
Discover the path to a successful security cloud. Then let Nokia show you how to secure your environment from end-to-end, starting at the data center switch or virtual switch all the way to the remote branch. Download use case <[[https://networks.nokia.com/use-case/large-webscale/security-cloud]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Terms of Use <[[{{my.Terms}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
